doc:
Jean Sorel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Sorel 0 Jean Sorel (French pronunciation: ​[ʒɑ̃ sɔʁɛl]; born 25 September 1934) is a French actor. Born Jean Bernard de Chieusses de Combaud de Roquebrune, he worked extensively in European cinema during the 1960s and 1970s with directors such as Luis Buñuel and Luchino Visconti. However, since 1980 he has worked mostly in television. He was married to Italian actress Anna Maria Ferrero from 1962 until her death in 2018. Jean_Sorel ( French_pronunciation : [_ʒɑ̃_sɔʁɛl_] ; born_25_September_1934 ) is a_French_actor . Born_Jean_Bernard de Chieusses de Combaud de Roquebrune , he worked extensively in European_cinema during the_1960s_and_1970s with directors such_as Luis_Buñuel and Luchino_Visconti . However , since 1980 he has_worked mostly in television . He was_married to Italian_actress_Anna_Maria_Ferrero from 1962 until her_death in 2018 .
